subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The inclusion of Felipe Melo on the Brazilian team, and his red-card ejection from the quarterfinal, was a stark reminder that Brazil was not playing with its usual style.
snippet: The inclusion of Felipe Melo on the Brazilian team, and his red-card ejection from the quarterfinal, was a stark reminder that Brazil was not playing with its usual style.
